title: India To Be Part Of Pax Silica, Says US Ambassador Sergio Gor As Tech Partnerships Deepen
description: India will be invited to join Pax Silica, a US-led strategic initiative aimed at securing critical supply chains across silicon, advanced manufacturing and artificial intelligence, new US ambassador Sergio Gor said on Monday. Gor underscored continued engagement between the two sides, even as global technology and supply-chain politics become more complex. “Real friends can disagree but always resolve their differences,” he said, adding that “both sides continue to be actively engaged.”
content:
